mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbmember (memno, email, password, nickname, name, gendercd, birthymd, entymd, loccd, imgname,categcd, phonenum, credt, upddt) VALUES (seq_memno.nextVal, #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{gendercd}, #{birthymd}, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD'), #{loccd}, 'default.png', #{categcd}, #{phonenum}, sysdate, sysdate)
